subject: Interscholastic Athletics
Wrestling
Amputation
Handicapped
lead_paragraph: With legs that end at his hips and much of his arms amputated, 18 year-old Ohio wrestler Dustin Carter defies the odds. But don’t feel sorry for him.
snippet: With legs that end at his hips and much of his arms amputated, 18 year-old Ohio wrestler Dustin Carter defies the odds. But don’t feel sorry for him.
